Question
========

If you roll two pure dice at the same time, how many possible outcomes will there be if the sum of the number of eyes of both dice is 6?

Answerlist
----------

* 4
* 5
* 6
* 7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 4: Incorrect
* 5: Correct
* 6: Incorrect
* 7: Incorrect
